Class MessageEntity

java.lang.Object
io.github.natanimn.telebof.types.media_and_service.MessageEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MessageEntity extends Object implements Serializable
This object represents one special entity in a text message. For example, hashtags, usernames, URLs, etc.
Since:
3 March 2025
Version:
0.9
Author:
Natanim

  • Field Details

    • url

      public String url
      Optional. For “text_link” only, URL that will be opened after user taps on the text

    • language

      public String language
      Optional. For “pre” only, the programming language of the entity text

    • offset

      public Integer offset
      Offset in UTF-16 code units to the start of the entity

    • length

      public Integer length
      Length of the entity in UTF-16 code units

    • user

      public User user
      Optional. For “text_mention” only, the mentioned user

    • custom_emoji_id

      public String custom_emoji_id
      Optional. For “custom_emoji” only, unique identifier of the custom emoji. Use BotContext.getCustomEmojiStickers(java.lang.String[]) to get full information about the sticker

    • type

      public EntityType type
      Type of the entity.
